tool_description: This API gives access to all bank,state,district,city master information and it can be used as an IFSC search functionality, which will give the detail of IFSC once entered the above details
name: IFSC Search
title: IFSC Search

api_list.name: getIFSCList
api_list.description:
Pass ifsc code to get bank details
use intiator_id as 9466009091 for all the API's

required_parameters.name: initiator_id
required_parameters.description: This is the customer id of the initiator

api_list.name: getMasterBank
api_list.description:
By passing appropriate brand code in the qyery parameter you can get single brand information
use intiator_id as 9466009091 for all the API's

required_parameters.name: initiator_id
required_parameters.description: This is the cellnumber of the initiator

required_parameters.name: state_code
required_parameters.description: Get Information for a single service

required_parameters.name: bank_code
required_parameters.description: Get Information for a single service
